name: Broiled Soft-Shell Crabs
keywords: crab, lemon, olive oil, main course, spring
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, optional

recipeInstructions.text: Heat broiler, placing rack just beneath the heat source. Heat a large nonstick roasting pan under broiler for about 10 minutes.
Place crabs, top shell up, in heated pan. Broil until firm and lightly browned, 3 to 5 minutes. Drizzle lightly with olive oil, sprinkle with salt, and serve with lemon wedges.
